intro: Aphaca pseudophaca, commonly known as the narrow-leafed sandwort, is a low-growing perennial plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of North America. Aphaca pseudophaca plays a role in stabilizing soil and providing habitat for small insects and arthropods in its native habitat.
